comment:
Extracted Variables:
1. \( x_1 \): Number of sq. feet allocated for phone production
2. \( x_2 \): Number of sq. feet allocated for laptop production
3. \( var1 \): Labor hours required for phones (2 hours)
4. \( var2 \): Labor hours required for laptops (3 hours)
5. \( var3 \): Cost per sq. foot for phone production ($12)
6. \( var4 \): Cost per sq. foot for laptop production ($15)
7. \( var5 \): Net revenue per sq. foot for phones ($50)
8. \( var6 \): Net revenue per sq. foot for laptops ($70)

Constraints:
1. Labor constraint: \( 2x_1 + 3x_2 \leq 2000 \) (2000 hours of labor available)
2. Cost constraint: \( 12x_1 + 15x_2 \leq 5000 \) ($5000 budget limit)
3. Space constraint: \( x_1 + x_2 \leq 100 \) (100 sq. feet of space available)

Objective:
Maximize revenue: \( 50x_1 + 70x_2 \)
